name: LDS Book Of Mormon Card Match
name_original: LDS Book Of Mormon Card Match
description:
LDS bible memory match is very exciting and funny game with many different Christ's pictures, which your child will definitely love!

features and benefit:
- this game is the best way for your children to improve their concentration and memory.
- 20 levels to play
- test your memory! simply flip the cards to reveal a matching pair.

how to play:

match the cards and clear the levels. the less moves you do the more stars you get.
